scripts.build:api: NODE_ENV=production npm run package:core:build && npm run package:api:build && npm run app:api:build
scripts.build:backend: NODE_ENV=production npm run package:core:build && npm run app:backend:build
scripts.build:backend-read-env: NODE_ENV=production npm run package:core:build && npm run app:backend:build-read-env
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "P:CORE,P:API,A:API,A:BACKEND,P:EXAMPLE" -c "#d531f5,#4d5ffa,#09e3b4,#f41788,#f1610a,#61f10a" "npm run package:core:dev" "npm run package:api:dev" "npm run app:api:dev" "npm run app:backend:dev"
scripts.dev:api: NODE_ENV=development npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "P:CORE,P:API,A:API,P:EXAMPLE" -c "#d531f5,#4d5ffa,#09e3b4,#f41788,#f1610a,#61f10a" "npm run package:core:dev" "npm run package:api:dev" "npm run app:api:dev"
scripts.dev:backend: NODE_ENV=development npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "P:CORE,P:API,A:API,A:BACKEND" -c "#d531f5,#4d5ffa,#09e3b4,#f41788,#f1610a,#61f10a" "npm run package:core:dev" "npm run package:api:dev" "npm run app:api:dev" "npm run app:backend:dev"
scripts.lint: npm run package:core:lint && npm run package:api:lint && npm run app:api:lint && npm run app:backend:lint && npm run app:frontend:lint
scripts.app:api:dev: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,NODE" -c "#dddddd,#aaaaaa,#777777" "npm run app:api:watch:babel" "sleep 5 && npm run app:api:watch:node"
scripts.app:api:build: NODE_ENV=production npx rimraf ./apps/api/build && npm run app:api:babel
scripts.app:backend:build-read-env: NODE_ENV=production VITE_API_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_API' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_FRONTEND_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_FRONTEND' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_PREVIEW_SECRET=$(grep '^APP_PREVIEW_SECRET' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_MAP_JSON=$(grep '^APP_MAP_JSON' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) npm run build -w backend
scripts.app:backend:dev:build: VITE_API_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_API' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_FRONTEND_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_FRONTEND' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_PREVIEW_SECRET=$(grep '^APP_PREVIEW_SECRET' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_MAP_JSON=$(grep '^APP_MAP_JSON' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true npm run build -w backend
scripts.app:backend:dev:build:serve: VITE_API_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_API' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_FRONTEND_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_FRONTEND' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_PREVIEW_SECRET=$(grep '^APP_PREVIEW_SECRET' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_MAP_JSON=$(grep '^APP_MAP_JSON' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true npx serve apps/backend/build
scripts.app:backend:dev: PORT=$(grep DEV_BACKEND_PORT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_API_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_API' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_API_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_API' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_FRONTEND_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_FRONTEND' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_PREVIEW_SECRET=$(grep '^APP_PREVIEW_SECRET' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) VITE_MAP_JSON=$(grep '^APP_MAP_JSON' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true npm run start -w backend
scripts.app:backend:translations: echo "Please run 'npm run i18n-extract' right in the ./app/backend folder"
scripts.package:api:dev: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,TYPINGS" -c "#dddddd,#aaaaaa,#777777" "npm run package:api:watch:babel" "npm run package:api:watch:typings"
scripts.package:api:build: NODE_ENV=production npx rimraf ./packages/api/dist && npm run package:api:db:generate && npm run package:api:babel && npm run package:api:typings
scripts.package:core:dev: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,TYPINGS" -c "#dddddd,#aaaaaa,#777777" "npm run package:core:watch:babel" "npm run package:core:watch:typings"
scripts.package:core:build: npx rimraf ./packages/core/dist && NODE_ENV=production npm run package:core:babel && NODE_ENV=production npm run package:core:typings
